problems.title: Ugly Number III (Number Theory)
problems.description:
An ugly number is a positive integer that is divisible by a, b, or c.
Given four integers n, a, b, and c, return the nth ugly number.

Input Format:
First line: four integers n, a, b, c.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the nth ugly number.
hintsList: Use Binary Search on the answer.
Use inclusion-exclusion principle to count divisibles.
